CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains Warm-Up to MOT then leaves the room
MOT sits down on a stool as she guides CHI into the center of the room
MOT picks up the football and tosses it in the air
MOT tosses the ball and lets it fall to the floor
MOT tosses the ball in the air
CHI looks down and reaches for the ball
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI looks up then looks down in the direction of the ball
MOT looks up at the camera
<aft> MOT rolls the ball across the room
CHI turns a bit toward MOT so her back is to the camera
CHI looks across the room toward the door
<aft> MOT stands up and reaches for something on the floor by the desk
CHI turns and looks across the room
MOT opens her purse to look for something
CHI stands facing MOT with her back to the camera
CHI nods head no . <aft> CHI takes a couple of steps back away from MOT
MOT sits back on the stool facing CHI . <aft> MOT holds the bottle out toward CHI
CHI turns and looks across the room then faces MOT again
MOT looks across the room . <aft> MOT looks at CHI while holding the bottle out toward her
CHI nods head no then turns and looks down
MOT puts the bottle back in her purse
<aft> MOT looks down at the floor
MOT picks up toy duck and squeezes it
CHI stands looking in MOT's direction
CHI stands in front of MOT looking at the duck
CHI takes the duck from MOT
MOT looks down at the floor
CHI holds the duck up toward MOT
CHI holds onto MOT's knee as she turns and looks across the room
CHI takes a few steps then looks at the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks down
CHI looks up . <aft> CHI walks over to the clown and touches it

CHI watches and takes a couple of steps toward the jack+in+the+box

CHI looks at and touches the clown
MOT moves the clown closer to herself
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT stuffs the clown into the box again
CHI looks across the room then looks at the clown
MOT looks down then looks at CHI
MOT takes bottle out of her purse and offers it to CHI
CHI turns away from MOT while holding the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes some steps across the room . <aft> CHI looks up toward the door
<aft> MOT takes the jack+in+the+box from CHI then tries to stuff the clown into it
CHI walks toward MOT with arms outstretched
MOT continues to try and stuff the clown into the box
CHI watches then turns around and looks across the room
MOT places the jack+in+the+box on the floor and pushes the clown up and down
MOT looks down then up at CHI
CHI turns around and walks toward MOT
MOT holds up the jack+in+the+box toward CHI
CHI reaches out for the jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at door in response to voices outside
CHI looks up then down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves CHI over to the door . MOT leans CHI against the door by the measuring tape
CHI looks across the room while holding the jack+in+the+box
MOT measures CHI's height against the door
MOT looks up toward the door then reaches for something
MOT looks at CHI then up over her shoulder at something
CHI looks up while holding the jack+in+the+box
MOT looks down then reaches for the jack+in+the+box
MOT and CHI hold the jack+in+the+box between them and fidget with it
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box then pushes the clown up and down a few times . <aft> MOT places the clown on the floor
CHI walks closer to MOT while looking down
MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box and turns the crank
CHI walks past MOT while looking down

CHI turns and looks down toward the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on her lap then turns the crank
CHI turns and faces MOT with her back to the camera . <aft> CHI walks over to MOT

MOT stuffs clown into the box
CHI stuffs the clown into the box
MOT snaps the lid shut then turns the crank
CHI takes a step backwards and looks at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI removes MOT's hand from the crank
MOT tries to show CHI how to turn the crank

CHI watches MOT turn the crank
CHI turns and looks over her shoulder at the door
MOT turns and looks at the door
MOT and CHI looks at the door in response to noise
INV explains Forbidden Object to MOT

CHI reaches out and touches MOT while looking at the object
CHI looks at object then down toward MOT . CHI touches MOT
MOT picks up necklace that INV left for CHI
MOT looks at CHI while dangling the necklace in front of her face
CHI looks at object then at INV

MOT reaches up on desk to get some boxes

CHI is behind MOT partially visible
<$=2> MOT gets up on her knees and looks across the room
CHI is out of camera view

CHI is still out of camera view

MOT reaches for CHI then stops
